text: any pointer in implementing Dirichlet distribution in Gen?

elements.text: any pointer in implementing Dirichlet distribution in Gen?

text:
Hi there! You should be able to use `GenDistributions.jl`, available here: <https://github.com/probcomp/GenDistributions.jl>

```using GenDistributions
using Distributions
const dirichlet = DistributionsBacked(alpha -> Dirichlet(alpha), (true,), true, Vector{Float64})```
